description:
Just after winning a national water polo title in his third year of junior high, a car accident left Minato Kiyomizu in a coma. Nearly a year passes before he awakes, but with no memory of his last school year. Now in high school with a fresh start, he leaves the sport behind, but a promise has him returning to it. However, his new team is weak, and that’s just a sign for more problems to come.

(Source: Funimation)

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Swimming
tags.description: Centers around the sport of swimming.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

node.description:
Utatane Kana is a lyricist, composer, arranger and pianist from Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan. She works for Tawara and is part of KanadeYUK.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Utatanekana)

ENHYPEN is a South Korean 7-member boy band formed by Belift Lab, a joint venture between CJ ENM and Hybe Corporation.The group was formed through the survival competition *I-LAND*. They debuted on November 30, 2020 with the EP *Border: Day One*.

**Members:**
- Jungwon (정원) *(Leader)*
- Heeseung (희승)
- Jay (제이)
- Jake (제이크)
- Sunghoon (성훈)
- Sunoo (선우)
- Ni-ki (니키)

Began his career in animation at [Studio 4°C](https://anilist.co/studio/13/), where he worked on projects like [Genius Party Beyond](https://anilist.co/anime/6795/). In 2011, he was handpicked by then president [Masao Maruyama](https://anilist.co/staff/103170/) to join [Mappa](https://anilist.co/studio/569/) as a producer. He then went on to work as an animation producer on numerous titles such as [Kids on the Slope](https://anilist.co/anime/12531/), [Terror in Resonance](https://anilist.co/anime/20661/) and [Shingeki no Bahamut: Genesis](https://anilist.co/anime/20590/).

In April 2016, Maruyama handed Ootsuka the reigns of the studio and he took on the role of a producer and the CEO.
Director and General Manager of CGI Department at [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/). He's also a Board Member at [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/rollo_alfredo) | [Instagram 1](https://Instagram.com/alfredo_rollodub/) | [Instagram 2](https://www.instagram.com/rollou_insight/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/alfredo.sa.54) | [Website](https://alfredorollovoz.wixsite.com/alfredo-rollo---psic)

Alfredo dos Santos Rollo, better known only as Alfredo Rollo, is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, psychologist, psychoanalyst, and psychodramatist. He is married to the voice actress [Melissa Garcia](https://anilist.co/staff/103053/).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Lucifer Mornigstar (Lucifer)
- James "Jim" Halpert (The Office)
- Gideon Graves (Scott Pilgrim vs. The World)
- Lass Isolet (Grand Chase Classic and Grand Chase: Dimensional Chaser)
- Julian Solo / Poseidon (Saint Seiya: Soldiers' Soul)
- Dewey Finn (1st dub; School of Rock)
- Chuckie Sullivan (1st dub; Good Will Hunting)
- Marcus (Arcane)
- Stu Pickles (2nd voice; Rugrats franchise)
- Josh (Detroit: Become Human)
- Vic (Disney Universe)
- Cha Sung-Te (Big Mouth South Korean TV series)
!~
